title: The Earth reveals
creator_credit: Ian Dunlop, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Mineral mining in Australia and the never-ending search for new resources: gold at Kalgoorlie; lead, zinc and silver at Broken Hill and the floatation process used; mining at Iron Knob in South Australia; copper and lead at Mt Isa; uranium at Mary Kathleen; and search for oil in Queensland and New Guinea.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Dunlop, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
